title: How to write and publish your own novel under $1000 - Quora

response.answer_text: Use Lulu.com. At that website, you upload your text, upload your cover — or use any of the ones Lulu offers free, and then hit enter. Meantime you will be bombarded with Lulu programs that will supposedly make your book a best-seller. Ignore them, please. Using the services I suggested above, your book — a paperback with full color cover — will cost you about $5. Good luck!
